thread.title: Tiphannie
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Tiphannie

author: Tiphannie
title: Tiphannie
text: When we first walked into the store, we received a very big and gracious welcome from Jose one of the sales associates. The store was very clean, well organized, and everyone was very friendly and willing to help. The furniture is very beautiful and made of good quality materials which are two things that my husband and I look for. And the prices are unbelievable! Jose really made our shopping experience a wonderful one and he explained about the furniture very thoroughly. The layaway process even makes your shopping easy and very affordable. We have recommended your furniture store to several of our friends . Keep up the great work! We will be back!
